share_info.tips: #唐嫣新剧编剧秦雯#的相关内容，来智搜看看

response.share_text: #唐嫣新剧编剧秦雯#的相关内容，来智搜看看
response.msg:
嗯，用户想了解唐嫣新剧编剧秦雯的事情。看了很多搜索结果，发现这件事挺复杂的，我来梳理一下关键点。

首先看到唐嫣的新剧叫《爱情没有神话》，原名是《独身女人》，改编自亦舒的小说。这部剧由秦雯担任编剧，张晓波导演，唐嫣和赵又廷主演。原本计划11月7日在央视八套和腾讯视频播出。

不过现在情况有变，多个消息源显示这部剧可能要撤档延播了。有用户说收到通知，原定11月9日的剧宣活动取消了，理由是"排播有调整"。央视频的节目单也显示，原来排播的《爱情没有神话》被换成了家庭剧《四喜》，这部剧已经启动宣传并确定提档到11月7日播出。

为什么突然撤档呢？主要问题出在编剧秦雯身上。搜索结果里提到她陷入了几起争议事件：
- 有录音曝光她涉嫌袭警后"找人捞出"，还得意地说"分分钟搞定"。
- 古二爆料她在创作《繁花》时还同时接其他工作，用了枪手。
- 录音中还涉及她对陈道明、靳东等演员的不当言论。
这些争议引发舆论风波，可能影响了新剧的播出。

唐嫣这边就有点"躺枪"了。她本人和团队对此保持沉默，延续她一贯"无伤大雅的谣言不回应"的原则。不过粉丝们很着急，担心她为这部剧付出的努力白费。有粉丝提到唐嫣为这个角色做了很多准备，期待她继《繁花》汪小姐后再创佳绩。

业内对撤档原因有不同看法：
- 有人认为纯粹是秦雯的负面新闻导致；
- 也有人指出这部剧其实从未官宣定档，所以不存在严格意义上的"撤档"；
- 还有观点猜测可能和改名引发的争议有关，从《独身女人》改名为《爱情没有神话》被部分观众吐槽"土味"。

现在制作方和平台都还没正式回应。腾讯视频和新丽传媒没发布任何官方撤档声明。唐嫣11月的行程里也没有这部剧的宣传安排，不过这可能和她另一部新剧《此刻的生活》在筹备期有关。

有意思的是，这已经是唐嫣和秦雯第二次合作了，之前《繁花》中秦雯也是编剧。没想到这次合作会出这样的问题。对观众来说，只能继续等待官方消息了。


根据综合信息整理，关于唐嫣新剧《爱情没有神话》与编剧秦雯的相关动态及争议如下：
### 一、新剧撤档及延期原因
1. **撤档/延期确认**
- 原定2025年11月7日登陆央视八套黄金档和腾讯视频播出的《爱情没有神话》，因"排播调整"临时撤档。原档期由童瑶、蒋欣、黄明昊主演的家庭剧《四喜》提档填补。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 5, "data": {"num": [1, 14, 19, 28], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "吃瓜姐妹", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228975901115696", "index": 1, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "李冷冷·", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228976940259071", "index": 14, "label": ""}, {"name": "子衿ul", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228922729401177", "index": 19, "label": ""}, {"name": "二胖说剧", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228934035931272", "index": 28, "label": ""}], "name": "吃瓜姐妹", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1125.1125.50/0078PwdQly8fv9zg8hr48j30v90v90u5.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762232336&ssig=intTOgWeTe", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228975901115696", "vType": 0}}```
- 佐证信息包括：11月9日剧宣活动取消，央视频节目单替换为《四喜》，腾讯视频未官宣定档但内部排播计划已调整。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 6, "data": {"num": [1, 14, 22, 28], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "李冷冷·", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228976940259071", "index": 14, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "吃瓜姐妹", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228975901115696", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "芙蓉鱼_顾时夜1122生日快乐", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228988738835616", "index": 22, "label": ""}, {"name": "二胖说剧", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228934035931272", "index": 28, "label": ""}], "name": "李冷冷·", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/005Jlv9Ily8hr0dlcv7tnj30u00u0jv7.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762232336&ssig=7isb4UGRN0", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228976940259071", "vType": 0}}```

2. **撤档关联编剧秦雯风波**
- **袭警争议**：秦雯被曝录音自述袭警后"打电话找人捞出"，涉事派出所为上海瑞金二路派出所，引发特权质疑。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 8, "data": {"num": [3, 36, 39], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "友谊已走到尽头啦", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227818151051659", "index": 3, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "Real皮皮王", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228093520216280", "index": 36, "label": ""}, {"name": "音潮狗狗派", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228193545196446", "index": 39, "label": ""}], "name": "友谊已走到尽头啦", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.896.896.50/005yxpy7ly8gw1tgfwedhj30ow0owwi8.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762232336&ssig=zBTRKA5TVa", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227818151051659", "vType": 0}}```
- **行业纠纷**：编剧古二指控秦雯在《繁花》《流金岁月》等剧中压榨枪手、霸占署名权，并曝光其私下贬低陈道明、靳东等演员。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 9, "data": {"num": [4, 8, 42], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "我们农村人怎么你了", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227787003631184", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "看剧点评星人", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5214409280719420", "index": 8, "label": ""}, {"name": "娱乐小饭", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5213820428487467", "index": 42, "label": ""}]}}```
- **舆论影响**：负面发酵导致网友抵制秦雯参与作品，平台恐风险选择延期。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 10, "data": {"num": [16, 30, 39], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "游哆米", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229194420160574", "index": 16, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "老特拉福德的糖猫儿", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228932177859153", "index": 30, "label": ""}, {"name": "音潮狗狗派", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228193545196446", "index": 39, "label": ""}], "name": "游哆米", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/bde17a3dly8hkpoyvylbpj20u00u0dkh.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762232336&ssig=RKdt%2F2FXen", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229194420160574", "vType": 0}}```

### 二、剧集背景及主创信息
1. **基础信息**
- 原名《独身女人》，改编自亦舒小说，更名后聚焦"去浪漫化爱情观"。
- 唐嫣饰演独立服装设计师林展翘，赵又廷出演颓废作家何德璋，导演张晓波（《三十而已》），秦雯任编剧。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 15, "data": {"num": [15, 29], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "青春影视室", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228509257534935", "index": 29, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "我也有白点", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228981827928784", "index": 15, "label": ""}], "name": "青春影视室", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/006Q9EEbly8i5rhrq48vrj30u00u03zq.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762232336&ssig=xYSdOo4pWg", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228509257534935", "vType": 0}}```
- 集数由40集删减至37集，职场线弱化、情感线增强，引发原著粉不满。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 16, "data": {"num": [16, 21], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "游哆米", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229194420160574", "index": 16, "label": ""}, {"name": "盼星纱月落", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228981907621541", "index": 21, "label": ""}]}}```

2. **唐嫣与秦雯的二度合作**
- 两人曾合作《繁花》（唐嫣凭"汪小姐"获金熊猫视后），此次新剧被视为唐嫣转型实力派的关键作品。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 18, "data": {"num": [5, 13, 45], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "抽象天才懒羊羊", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5214346655044409", "index": 5, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "甜仃", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229189592514670", "index": 13, "label": ""}, {"name": "Data达瓦里氏", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5220209302700498", "index": 45, "label": ""}], "name": "抽象天才懒羊羊", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/68c5b6d5ly8i4qbuqi9saj20u00u0ta3.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762232336&ssig=LzgHYAvJSO", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5214346655044409", "vType": 0}}```
- 唐嫣公开感谢秦雯"将汪小姐改编得精彩"，并期待二次合作。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 19, "data": {"num": [13, 20], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "甜仃", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229189592514670", "index": 13, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "关我毛柿", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228986875777990", "index": 20, "label": ""}], "name": "甜仃", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/006CKmHvly8i1p8ppclo7j30u00u076t.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762232336&ssig=53c175UnD0", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229189592514670", "vType": 0}}```
青春影视室
Data达瓦里氏

### 三、撤档对唐嫣的影响
1. **无妄之灾与沉默应对**
- 唐嫣因秦雯争议及王家卫录音事件（被批"很装"）卷入舆论，但团队延续"非底线争议冷处理"策略，未公开回应。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 23, "data": {"num": [27, 35], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "职场打工青年", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228995038942903", "index": 35, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "娱庭若尘缘", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229049271027308", "index": 27, "label": ""}], "name": "职场打工青年", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/92781675ly8hn367w69bnj20u00u075i.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762232336&ssig=v3nBNGLQ3V", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228995038942903", "vType": 0}}```
- 粉丝不满新剧受牵连，呼吁剧方核查编剧署名真实性。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 24, "data": {"num": [33, 39], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "小人物的小吐槽", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229197842711919", "index": 33, "label": ""}, {"name": "音潮狗狗派", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228193545196446", "index": 39, "label": ""}]}}```

2. **事业布局受挫**
- 该剧是唐嫣继《繁花》后首部都市女主剧，列入央视2026年重点片单，延期打乱冲奖计划。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 26, "data": {"num": [16, 29], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "游哆米", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229194420160574", "index": 16, "label": ""}, {"name": "青春影视室", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228509257534935", "index": 29, "label": ""}]}}```
- 其后续作品《此刻的生活》（新丽出品）已官宣，编剧仍为秦雯，恐再生变数。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 27, "data": {"num": [37, 40, 41], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "科技阿楠", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229192494976983", "index": 37, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "slpwlpls_Tang", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226445987121454", "index": 40, "label": ""}, {"name": "鲤酱鲤鲤", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226452447923188", "index": 41, "label": ""}], "name": "科技阿楠", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/9ff30c79ly8hjefyh32jyj20go0go75k.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762232336&ssig=HLoMU1hjTB", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229192494976983", "vType": 0}}```
职场打工青年

### 四、行业争议与观众态度
1. **编剧行业乱象反思**
- 秦雯被指"轧编剧"（同时接多部戏）、用枪手、独揽功劳，业内呼吁规范署名制度。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 31, "data": {"num": [4, 8, 33], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "我们农村人怎么你了", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227787003631184", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "看剧点评星人", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5214409280719420", "index": 8, "label": ""}, {"name": "小人物的小吐槽", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229197842711919", "index": 33, "label": ""}]}}```
- 对比TVB剧集体署名模式，内娱编剧垄断署名权现象受诟病。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 32, "data": {"num": [8], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "看剧点评星人", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5214409280719420", "index": 8, "label": ""}]}}```

2. **观众立场分化**
- 支持派：期待唐嫣新角色，希望剧集与编剧个人问题切割。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 34, "data": {"num": [6, 15, 32], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "财浪天", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229192329299288", "index": 6, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "我也有白点", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228981827928784", "index": 15, "label": ""}, {"name": "财建筑", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229198412090425", "index": 32, "label": ""}], "name": "财浪天", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.888.888.50/6c893236ly8fqjxuyuorlj20oo0oo75l.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762232336&ssig=IcbGFEXsZo", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5229192329299288", "vType": 0}}```
- 抵制派：认为秦雯争议触及法律红线（特权捞人），拒看其作品。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 35, "data": {"num": [3, 36, 39], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "Real皮皮王", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228093520216280", "index": 36, "label": ""}, {"name": "友谊已走到尽头啦", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227818151051659", "index": 3, "label": ""}, {"name": "音潮狗狗派", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228193545196446", "index": 39, "label": ""}], "name": "Real皮皮王", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.440.440.50/003cgbmWly8h8teh09fuoj60c80c80ta02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762232336&ssig=5Mh2ytC1I3", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228093520216280", "vType": 0}}```
财浪天

### 五、当前进展与展望
- **播出前景**：制作方新丽传媒未官宣撤档，仅称"择期播出"。业内分析可能待秦雯风波司法定性后重新排播。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 38, "data": {"num": [22, 28, 30], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "老特拉福德的糖猫儿", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228932177859153", "index": 30, "label": ""}, {"name": "芙蓉鱼_顾时夜1122生日快乐", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228988738835616", "index": 22, "label": ""}, {"name": "二胖说剧", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228934035931272", "index": 28, "label": ""}], "name": "老特拉福德的糖猫儿", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/69120886ly8hkxogugvjmj20u00u0n09.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762232336&ssig=SZy%2BzhBQhc", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228932177859153", "vType": 0}}```
- **唐嫣应对**：重心转向《此刻的生活》宣传，以工作动态转移焦点。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 39, "data": {"num": [40], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "slpwlpls_Tang", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226445987121454", "index": 40, "label": ""}]}}```
